title: Did a 1922 Article Advise Not to Worry About Hitler’s Anti-Semitism?
subtitle: An early New York Times report about Adolf Hitler woefully misjudged the virulence of his anti-semitism.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A 1922 New York Times article reported that Adolf Hitler “was merely using anti-Semitic propaganda as a bait to catch masses of followers”.
